name: class-records

scripts.migration:generate-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run typeorm:cli migration:generate -p libs/common/src/dbContext/migrations/migration
scripts.migration:run-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run typeorm:cli migration:run
scripts.data-generator:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nest start data-generator  --debug --watch -- -t teachers -q 10000

description: Project root, used to migrate the database and storage general logic.
author: Nevsky Vladislav
